Veratis sits watching the screens when he spots the pod. he opens a 
com to his assistant. "Foxfingers, a pod has landed on the other side 
of the ocean. do you think your board will carry you that far?"

"Is a Sharkticon a carnivore?" the foxbot replies sarcastically. he 
hops on his hoverboard and begins his voyage across the sea. To get 
there he would have to travel through many hostile territories and 
brave many troubles to make it to the pod.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Up over what will be known as the Grand Canyon, a buzzing noise 
emits. As
> it gets louder, a flaming object hits the ground creating a huge 
impact. As
> the smoke clears from the crater, a red hot stasis pod begins to 
cool down,
> ready for somone to find it.
